00033    /*
00034    * Read parameter file. 
00035    *
00036    * \param in input parameter file stream.
00037    */
00038    void ActorManager::readParam(std::istream &in)
00039    {
00040       readBegin(in, "ActorManager");
00041       Manager<Actor>::readParam(in);
00042 
00043       Actor* ptr;
00044       for  (int i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
00045          ptr = &(*this)[i];
00046          if (ptr->hasSetupPostExchange()) { 
00047             actionsSetupPostExchange_.push_back(ptr); 
00048          }
00049          if (ptr->hasSetupPostNeighbor()) { 
00050             actionsSetupPostNeighbor_.push_back(ptr); 
00051          }
00052          if (ptr->hasSetupPostForce()) { 
00053             actionsSetupPostForce_.push_back(ptr); 
00054          }
00055          if (ptr->hasPreIntegrate()) { 
00056             actionsPreIntegrate_.push_back(ptr); 
00057          }
00058          if (ptr->hasPostIntegrate()) { 
00059             actionsPostIntegrate_.push_back(ptr); 
00060          }
00061          if (ptr->hasPreTransform()) { 
00062             actionsPreTransform_.push_back(ptr); 
00063          }
00064          if (ptr->hasPreExchange()) { 
00065             actionsPreExchange_.push_back(ptr); 
00066          }
00067          if (ptr->hasPostExchange()) { 
00068             actionsPostExchange_.push_back(ptr); 
00069          }
00070          if (ptr->hasPostNeighbor()) { 
00071             actionsPostNeighbor_.push_back(ptr); 
00072          }
00073          if (ptr->hasPreUpdate()) { 
00074             actionsPreUpdate_.push_back(ptr); 
00075          }
00076          if (ptr->hasPostUpdate()) { 
00077             actionsPostUpdate_.push_back(ptr); 
00078          }
00079          if (ptr->hasPreForce()) { 
00080             actionsPreForce_.push_back(ptr); 
00081          }
00082          if (ptr->hasPostForce()) { 
00083             actionsPostForce_.push_back(ptr); 
00084          }
00085          if (ptr->hasEndOfStep()) { 
00086             actionsEndOfStep_.push_back(ptr); 
00087          }
00088          if (ptr->hasPackExchange()) { 
00089             actionsUnpackExchange_.push_back(ptr); 
00090          }
00091          if (ptr->hasPackUpdate()) { 
00092             actionsUnpackUpdate_.push_back(ptr); 
00093          }
00094          if (ptr->hasPackReverseUpdate()) { 
00095             actionsUnpackReverseUpdate_.push_back(ptr); 
00096          }
00097       } // end for i
00098    }
00099 
00100    // Setup
00101 
00102    void ActorManager::setupPostExchange() 
00103    {
00104       int n = actionsSetupPostExchange_.size();
00105       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00106          actionsSetupPostExchange_[i]->setupPostExchange();
00107       }
00108    }
00109

00112       int n = actionsSetupPostNeighbor_.size();
00113       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00114          actionsSetupPostNeighbor_[i]->setupPostNeighbor();
00115       }
00116    }

00122          actionsSetupPostForce_[i]->setupPostForce();
00123       }

00128    void ActorManager::preIntegrate(long iStep)
00129    {
00130       Actor* ptr;
00131       int n = actionsPreIntegrate_.size();
00132       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00133          ptr = actionsPreIntegrate_[i];
00134          if (ptr->isAtInterval(iStep)) {
00135             ptr->preIntegrate();
00136          }
00137       }
00138    }
